content.label: I've put hours of play into this game and it's still fun! I've probably played this game for about 75 hours total. Great job, but a bit of a dead developer.

This game is one of the best mobile apps out there. It's something that had to be experienced for yourself. I spent hours upon hours developing games and consoles and still haven't stopped at year 40. Truly addictive and a masterpiece.
There is one glitch that ticks me off. When ever someone asks to improve something it always fails it's failed 5 times at 80%

How do you get a hardware engineer 
Every time I choose someone with that as a previous job, it's unavailable. Why?
Buy it, it's the best ever....

It's a very addictive fun game without any crashing in game purchases or lag spikes but the tutorial wasn't that clear so I had a very hard time picking up on the game. There are still many things I don't know after countless hours of play. I would give it 4.5 if I could. It is one of the best tablet game I have ever installed other than that.

There are a ton of kairosoft games now but this is still by far the most entertaining. This game really has that "one more turn" addictive feel, so watch out if you're playing it before bed because it's pretty easy to lose an hour or two without noticing. Also, "A animal game?"
This game is so good I really really really really really want you to make a sequel! Please 🙏🙏🙏
I love this game. I think that it would be better if it included iPad support for split screen or screen rotation.
This game is amazing. The order in which the consoles are released is true to real life. I got my girlfriend into it too. I also have Cafe Nippon and Pocket League.

There are many things missing from this game, for example: I was never able to get a hardware engineer, so I could never make a console. The music is HORRIBLE, by the way. You don't make that many decisions that affect your game, and if your games stats get too high there is an equipment failure , setting u back. Also, for some reason when you train hackers they only get +1. You also can't do product research, for ex you can't see why people liked one of your games, what you can do to improve, etc. also sometimes u will pay 2 mil for a special artist musician or planner etc and they will give u something that the 10k comic fan could have done, also you can only upgrade your building twice which is annoying, also mister x wasn't very good either

I've played most of the games made by this company. Game dev is the best by far. I have played it so many times and still play it from time to time. For those who complain about graphics need to understand the game was made in 1997, while there was still better graphics even then, this was the style they chose. This is merely a port from the 1997 Japanese PC version. Nonetheless great port and a great game.
Top 5 game ever. Simulation hall of fame
I usually don't game on my phone but man this is a great game that just keeps pulling you in giving you more and more of an experience.
I've spent so much time playing this game, there is more than enough content to keep you busy for hours on end. Worth every penny!
Available in Chinese
A game about how to create game. And it was designed so well!

Since downloading Game Dev Story, 24 hours ago, I've accumulated no less than 10 solid hours on this game. Significant considering I'd been simultaneously spending holiday time with the family. What I've experienced with this app is an explosively entertaining, attention grasping economic thrill the likes of Rolled Coasted Tycoon 2. The UI is well set, albeit clunky and lacks providing useful information before making big decisions (creating a game for ex.). The only disappointment is that now I have no where else to grow. You can only improve the office size twice, hiring new employees with the Hollywood hunter person (most expensive hiring option) tapers off and you are rarely if ever able to hire someone over 200 stats in a single category, and something is terrifyingly wrong with the yearly awards selections; in the same year, the computer generated game "Dragon Crest" won both BEST AND WORST GOT......WHAT!? 

Game needs fixing, but is an impressively solid beginning to what can be an unbelievable respite from family gatherings.
yo this game is pretty fun. graphics aren't the highest of quality because it's meant to be like a chiptune sort of thing. very addicting, to see your business grow and grow.

title.label: Graphics and gameplay are bad and music is annoying

content.label: I love pixelated graphics normally, but this was a little too pixelated. The gameplay was nit very well explained, and there wasn't much to do. You kinda just sit there and wait for things to happen, then click a few buttons and wait some more. The music made me want to rip me eardrums out. It's high pitched and annoying. I get it that they tried to make a retro sounding theme, but when it's repeated over and over and isn't good to begin with, it gets really hard to listen to.

title.label: Fun at first but gets tedious

content.label: In spite of its flaws, I was amused by the parody names of the fictional consoles.
It's an amazing game . The only flaw about it is it should have more of a longer story ! Like , getting bigger offices and more harder contracts with even more talented workers !

Honestly this is a really great game the way it is but it always could be better... i would try to make more available places to buy, more workers. Find a way to allow more games to be made at once. And basically uprade everything else, the max fans is 10k u could make it more. But either way great game!
I would rate this 6 stars, but can't. It's so good and I think it should get a sequel ASAP!!!!
Please make it so that it continues adding consoles such as the modern next gen consoles.

title.label: This may be the best game on the App Store

content.label: Incredibly addictive and fun simulation. Awesome amount of variables and variety. Now if only I could get my game to warrant a score like this when I play it.
Very fun to replay! Worth the money

title.label: The best game on the App Store.

content.label:
When I first bought this game, I didn't know what to expect. I thought the concept was cool, but didn't know If it'd be great. 

In my humble opinion, this is the best game on the App Store. I was IMMEDIATELY pulled into this game. I was hooked from beginning to end. I didn't let it go for hours, and I'm not a person who likes to play games for hours upon hours. This game is truly special. Get it.
The game is fantastic and I play it for hours! The only problem with it is the text wrapping is kinda off but still a great game!
Bug makes it difficult to level genres and types of games. When I do manage to level one up to five it doesn't give me more development points. Please help!
I am a gamer and this is game has everything I love about simulation games. The history of gaming aspect of the game is so much fun. Pls if you guys can make version 2 I would totally buy it.

title.label: All I want is the ability to rename my games

content.label: And then 5 stars
I first got this game clear back in 2011. I didn't think they'd continue supporting it for this long, but I'm glad they do.
谢谢这次更新
I love this game, and have played it through on every mobile iDevice I have owned.
This game is so much fun although its expensive, I've had it for a couple of years and it amazing other good kairosoft games are mega mall & dungeon village
Kariosoft hasn't thought about something. That thing is the text of characters! It sometimes will say that they have a good idea except they do real bad.
I enjoy playing games on car trips, AirPlane rides, and just chilling at home. This is that game. It's really addictive, this game got me hooked to Kariosoft. Awesome game.
Seriously, can't not play this.

Amazing game and I love it to bits if there was one thing wrong with it its that its too short and I think it should be updated do instead of 20 years it should be 30 or even 40 it's a amazing game and you should definitely get this game
I love this game. I got the grand prize twice in the Global Game Awards. And I found the Jupiter 512. I just want the Hardware Engineer!!!!
I love this game! Grate time passer worth the money! Can u make a firework game plz kinda like this or a YouTuber simulation plz thanks!
It is a fun game, but the UI isn't very user friendly and isn't well made for use on an IPhone. Other than that, the game is amazing :)
I personally think that this game is really fun. I like these types of games and you can't find many good ones like this.

I absolutely love this game. I've wanted to try Game Dev Tycoon since watching jacksepticeye play it but this is a great way to find out if you like this kind of game without spending a lot of money. Been playing for hours!
This game is overall one of the best games I have ever played! Must Download!
This is probably the most amazing game on the store. I can't find another game that is so addicting and wastes my life away like this one; it's amazing for long car rides.
Great game, simple but lots to do

I love this game. It's fun and addicting. But when it comes to naming the games, it would be a lot better if your game's name didn't have to be 20 characters or less. So if you could update and fix that, that'd be great. You could make it so the name has to be 60 characters or less. But other than that, the game is AMAZING 😎
Garbage, don't download
